name: Data &Marketing Association Finland (FIDMA), Suomen Asiakkuusmarkkinointiliitto ry
goal: The objective is to support and improve the operating conditions of the data driven marketing industry and the members of the association in establishing a good and trusting relationship with consumers, media, business, industry, the authorities and government institutions as well as providing self regulation, member services, research, training and events.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives: All activities in the areas of data protection, digitalization, marketing and ecommerce.
